speaker: Christopher Whitten
title: Bot Framework Composer: Bot Framework’s new collaborative Conversational AI development environment
description:
The Bot Framework Composer is an integrated development environment that developers and multi-disciplinary teams can use to build bots. Within Composer, you'll find everything you need to build a sophisticated conversational experience: a visual dialog editor, tools to train and manage Language Understanding (LU), language generation and templating systems, and a ready-to-use bot runtime executable.
 
This presentation will go over the different features of Composer and explore its connection to the Bot Framework SDK to model dialogs, input recognition, and response generation. Multiple scenarios of creating sophisticated Conversational Applications will be explored while demonstrating the latest and greatest features of the Bot Framework SDK.
